original_title: วันหมาหอนที่ค่ายลูกเสือ
overview: The story originated from TV program “Bro.Mee, Ghost’s Friend”. The program presented the field part of one ghost story of Mee that took place at the scout camp which is haunted scout camp. TV production team composes of young teenagers whom always dare and encourage haunted scout camp. While they’re shooting their program in haunted scout camp. They have to facet haunted thing inside haunted scout camp which make all of them could not forget all the time.
title: Black Full Moon
